participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Shy and introspective, often lost in her thoughts. She enjoys video games and has a vivid imagination.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i love to play pobox. i hate school. i'm a 12 year old girl.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, with a passion for music and a relaxed attitude toward life. He enjoys reading and dancing on weekends.
participant_2.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: Hey! I hate school ? What about you?

yes, studying music education. How about you?
